item.description:
The poll is equal so far between lunch and bowling. But, I guess lunch is a safe bet. Also, some people would like to know the place of meeting before they can RSVP.

Let's all meet and greet for a casual lunch for our first meetup.

I have been to Punjabi Palace and enjoyed their food. Here's their website for more information. www.punjabpalace.com

See you all there!

P.S. If any of you have suggestions..bring them on! We need more participation...I would love to hear from everybody. I'm charging $1.00USD to cover membership charges.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one holding the meetup sign.
item.why: You'll get to meet other Indians in a cool, casual environment and have a blast.
item.name: Indian Friends First Meetup
